articles.author: Sofia Tomacruz
articles.title: Carpio urges PH, Malaysia, Vietnam to voluntarily settle territorial dispute in Spratlys - Rappler
articles.description: It is but timely for the Philippines and its Southeast Asian neighbors to try and settle its territorial dispute as 'China is slowly activating his claims in the territorial dispute,' says retired Supreme Court justice Antonio Carpio
articles.content: "China refused to appear but the tribunal proceeded to ratify its decision because China, when it ratified UNCLOS, agreed to that, that it will be subjected to compulsory arbitration. Unfortunately, … [+123 chars]

articles.author: Karen Gilchrist
articles.title: Shake Shack has 'big plans for Asia' as it ramps up expansion in the region - CNBC
articles.description: New York burger chain Shake Shack has "big plans for Asia," its CEO has said, as the company embarks on a regional expansion drive.
articles.content:

articles.author: Siti Rohani
articles.title: Home Alone star Macaulay Culkin now a dad, gets called out for past 'Asian babies' comment - CNA
articles.description: After Culkin and Brenda Song announced that they have a son named Dakota, netizens unearthed an old interview where the actor talked about wanting "a bunch of Sean Lennons running around the house".
